name: 徐曉萱
objective:
This course will introduce the semiconductor process, including device basics, process flow, manufacturing, and process integration. The students will gain a thorough overview on semiconductor manufacturing technology before working in industry.
Language: English
schedule:
1. Introduction of IC Fabrication 
2. Semiconductor Basics 
3. Wafer Manufacturing and Epitaxy
4. Oxidation and Thermal Processes 
5. CVD and PVD
6. Metallization   
7. Photolithography  
8.  Etching
9. Process Integration
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam 40%
Final Exam 40%
Homework and  Attendance 20%
materials:
Michael Quirk, Julian Serda, "Semiconductor Manufacturing Technology", Pearson, 2013
ISBN: 978-986-154-117-4
